text: Firestarter is a 1984 American science fiction horror movie directed by Mark L. Lester and was based on the 1980 novel of the same name by Stephen King. It stars Drew Barrymore, David Keith, Freddie Jones, Heather Locklear, George C. Scott, Martin Sheen, Art Carney, Louise Fletcher and was distributed by Universal Pictures.
